input_data.title: House of Lies
input_data.overview: Charming, fast talking Marty Kaan and his crack team of management consultants know how to play the corporate game better than anyone, by using every dirty trick in the book to woo powerful CEOs and close huge deals. In the board rooms, barrooms, and bedrooms of the power elite, corruption is business as usual and everyone's out for themselves first. Nothing is sacred in this scathing, irreverent satire of corporate America today.

response.analytical_summary: House of Lies is a darkly comedic drama series that satirizes the cutthroat world of corporate management consulting. The show follows Marty Kaan and his team as they manipulate CEOs and navigate complex deals, blurring the lines between ethics and ambition. With a cynical tone and sharp wit, the series explores themes of greed, power, and the compromises people make to achieve success, offering a provocative and often uncomfortable look at the American elite.
response.spoiler_rich_plot_summary: The series begins with Marty Kaan, a highly skilled but ethically flexible management consultant, attempting to secure a lucrative contract with the powerful Wexler Group. He and his team – Izzy, Miles, Tanner, and Monica – employ manipulative tactics and exploit personal relationships to win over CEO Henry Grabinski. As the series progresses, the team faces increasing pressure to deliver results, leading to escalating conflicts with Grabinski and internal power struggles within the group. Relationships are tested as personal lives intertwine with professional ambitions, and past actions come back to haunt the consultants. The team's pursuit of wealth and influence leads them down increasingly questionable paths, forcing them to confront the consequences of their choices and the moral compromises they're willing to make. Over time, the team members experience personal growth and face challenges that force them to re-evaluate their values and their place in the corporate landscape, though their core manipulative tendencies remain.
response.keyword_sentence: House of Lies is a darkly comedic drama series that satirizes the ruthless world of corporate management consulting, exploring themes of greed and moral compromise within a modern-day setting.
